H0.text: Which Chinese dynasty ruled from the 14th to the 17th century. 元朝

H1.text: Which Chinese dynasty ruled from the 14th to the 17th century. 唐朝

H2.text: Which Chinese dynasty ruled from the 14th to the 17th century. 宋朝

H3.text: Which Chinese dynasty ruled from the 14th to the 17th century. 明朝

A4.text: The Ming dynasty ruled from 1368 to 1644

A5.text: The Yuan dynasty collapsed in 1368, following which the Ming dynasty was established
